title: Random skin choice
body: I just think it would be neat if they added a 'random' choice as a skin. Just adds some flavor.

replies.body: I'd love that! I've got every Ezreal skin, and while I like Pulsefire, if I wanna use another one, I have a hard time deciding. Plus, I somehow ended up with most of Veigar's and Annie's skins, too, and usually can't decide which one I want to use when I get them in ARAM since they're all awesome.

You mean in champ select? if u have multiple skins u can click random and random one will be selected?

if so that's legit, i'd use it
